text:
“Why did I sign up? I’m 82, so I wanted to make sure I stuck around for another few years!”

Meet Frank Tarbox. He was one of the first people vaccinated at the new #COVID19 #vaccine clinic in Chelsea. 

Click here for appointment details ⬇️
